[[Zurich]] | canton = [[Canton of Zurich|Zurich]] | line = [[Zurich–Olten railway line|Zurich–Olten line]]<BR>[[Zürich–Affoltern am Albis–Zug railway line|Zurich–Affoltern am Albis–Zug line]] | elevation = | coordinates = {{coord|47|23|30|N|8|29|21|E|region:CH-ZH_type:railwaystation|display=inline,title}} | opened = | electrified = | rebuilt = | closed = | architect = | passengers = | platform = | owner = [[Swiss Federal Railways]] | operator = [[Swiss Federal Railways]] | services={{S-rail|title=Swiss rail network}} {{rail line |previous = {{Stnlnk|Zurich Oerlikon}} |next = {{Stnlnk|Dietikon}} |route = [[InterRegio]]<br /><small>Zurich Airport to Basle</small> |col = {{Swiss rail color|InterRegio}} }} {{rail line |previous = {{Stnlnk|Zurich Hardbrücke}} |next = {{Stnlnk|Schlieren}} |route = [[Zurich S-Bahn]]<br /><small>[[S3 (ZVV)|S3]] service</small> |col = {{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn}} |lightcol={{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn|branch=S3}}}} {{rail line |previous = {{Stnlnk|Zurich Hardbrücke}} |next = {{Stnlnk|Urdorf}} |route = [[Zurich S-Bahn]]<br /><small>[[S9 (ZVV)|S9]] service</small> |col = {{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn}} |lightcol={{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn|branch=S9}} }} {{rail line |previous = {{Stnlnk|Zurich Hardbrücke}} |next = {{Stnlnk|Schlieren}} |route = [[Zürich S-Bahn]]<br /><small>[[S12 (ZVV)|S12]] service</small> |col = {{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn}} |lightcol={{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn|branch=S12}} }} {{rail line |previous = {{Stnlnk|Zurich Hardbrücke}} |next = {{Stnlnk|Urdorf}} |route = [[Zürich S-Bahn]]<br /><small>[[S15 (ZVV)|S15]] service</small> |col = {{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn}} |lightcol={{Swiss rail color|Zurich S-Bahn|branch=S15}} }} }} '''Zurich Altstetten railway station''' ({{lang-de|Bahnhof Zürich Altstetten}}) is a [[railway station]] in the [[Altstetten (Zürich)|Altstetten quarter]] of the [[Switzerland|Swiss]] city of [[Zurich]]. The station is located on the [[Zurich–Olten railway line|Zurich to Olten main line]] and is the junction for the [[Zürich–Affoltern am Albis–Zug railway line|Zurich to Zug via Affoltern am Albis line]].<ref name=swmap>{{cite map | publisher = Swiss Confederation | title = map.geo.admin.ch | url = http://map.geo.admin.ch/?selectedNode=node_ch.swisstopo.swissboundaries3d-gemeinde-flaeche.fill1&Y=679237&X=249507&zoom=5&bgLayer=ch.swisstopo.pixelkarte-farbe&layers=ch.swisstopo.swissboundaries3d-gemeinde-flaeche.fill&layers_opacity=1&layers_visibility=true&lang=en | accessdate = 2012-04-26}}</ref><ref name=saw64-65>{{cite book | title = Eisenbahnatlas Schweiz | year = 2012 | publisher = Verlag Schweers + Wall GmbH | isbn=978-3-89494-130-7 | pages = 64-65}}</ref> The station is served by lines [[S3 (ZVV)|S3]], [[S9 (ZVV)|S9]], [[S12 (ZVV)|S12]] and [[S15 (ZVV)|S15]] of the [[Zurich S-Bahn]]. It is also a calling point for the hourly [[InterRegio]] service that links [[Basle]] and [[Zurich Airport]] whilst by-passing [[Zurich Hauptbahnhof]].<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.zvv.ch/export/sites/default/common-images/content-image-gallery/linien-zonen-pdfs/Liniennetzplan_Stadt_Zuerich_2010.pdf | title = City of Zurich Network | publisher = ZVV | accessdate = 2011-09-14}}</ref> An extension of the [[Zurich tram system]] to directly serve the northern side of the station opened in December 2011.<ref>{{cite web | title = Zürich West Tram | url = http://www.zvv.ch/en/about-us/infrastructure-projects/zurich-west-tram.html | accessdate = 2012-04-10}}</ref> == References == {{reflist}} == External links == * {{commonscat-inline|Bahnhof Altstetten|Zurich Altstetten railway station}} * [http://www.sbb.ch/en/station-services/am-bahnhof/railway-stations/bahnhof-finden.posid.3001.html Station data] from SBB web page * [http://www.sbb.ch/content/dam/infrastruktur/trafimage/bahnhofplaene/plan-zuerich-altstetten-a4.pdf Station plan] from SBB web page <BR> {{DEFAULTSORT:Zurich Altstetten Railway Station}} [[Category:Railway stations in the canton of Zurich]] [[Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations]] [[Category:Transport in Zurich]] {{Bözberg railway line}} {{Switzerland-railstation-stub}}
